definitions: a runner or competitor who sets the pace at the beginning of a race or competition, sometimes in order to help another runner break a record.
shortDefinitions: runner or competitor who sets pace at beginning of race or competition

definitions: a person or organization viewed as taking the lead or setting standards of achievement for others

examples.text: Alaska is the pacesetter when it comes to salaries for teachers

shortDefinitions: person or organization viewed as taking lead or setting standards of achievement for others
